#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <cctype>

using namespace std;

void _answer()
{
	register int i;
	string s;
	getline(cin ,s);
	unsigned int sum = 0;
	for (i = 0; i < s.size(); i++)
	{
		if(isdigit(s[i]))
			sum += (int)(s[i] - 48);
	}
	cout << sum << endl;
}

int main()
{
    
	unsigned short _t;
    cin >> _t;
	cin.ignore();
	while (_t--){
		_answer();
	}
    return 0;
}
